snippet: Employers added just 142,000 jobs in September, well below expectations, and the markets reacted with disappointment.
abstract: Stocks finish the day up after falling in early trading.
lead_paragraph: Employers added just 142,000 jobs in September, well below expectations, and the markets reacted with disappointment.

headline.main: Wall St. Falters, Then Rallies, After Weak Jobs Data
headline.print_headline: Traders Bet Fed Will Hold Steady After Weak Jobs Data
